revised_title: Joseph Stanley Mitchell: A Life Dedicated to Science and Service
scientific_discipline: Medicine and Health Sciences > Medical Research
tldr: This article is a biography of Joseph Stanley Mitchell, a prominent medical researcher and radiotherapist. Born in Birmingham in 1909, Mitchell showed an early interest in science and pursued his education in natural sciences and medicine. He conducted research in colloid science and radiotherapy, and held various positions in academia and medical institutions. Mitchell's life was dedicated to science, research, and service to those in need.
